about_the_game:
Venture Back in Time

Wylde Society takes place in the bustling town of Fairhaven at the turn of the century. Explore fashion, architecture, society rules and etiquette inspired by the recent past.

Run your own Magical Boarding House

Renovate and expand the Wylde family boarding house! Invite tenants and make them feel welcome during their stay. Some guests will only stay a season, but with your help, others may find a reason to stay for good.


Host Splendid Parties

As an adept socialite, you will plan and host a range of fancy social events including tea parties, dinners, and balls. Choose the guest list, menu, seating plan and more. Will you whip up drama… or kindle some romance?

Explore the Beyond

For a time, séances were a popular affair, but telling a real mystic from a charlatan was tricky! Vivian has a true knack for contacting spirits. Whose spirits will you help with their unfinished business?

Befriend Magical Creatures

Discover and collect charming familiars from cats to otters. These friendly companions have unique witchy talents, and love to keep you company (even on your broom)!

More news on features to come!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the elegant heels of Vivian Wylde, witch, socialite and host, in period drama sim Wylde Society! Build, run and customise your magical boarding house in turn of the century Fairhaven. Host splendid events, expand your witchcraft, and influence the town. Who will you invite for tea?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
